Answer: a) Arielle Kebbel played the character Gia Matteo in *Fifty Shades Darker*., b) *Fifty Shades Freed* was produced by Michael De Luca Productions., c) Both *Fifty Shades Darker* and *Fifty Shades Freed* were shot back-to-back.
